content: That's a great point about checking with the event organizers beforehand. I'll definitely do that. Also, I think it's a wonderful idea to offer custom jerseys to my colleagues who are participating or volunteering. We actually raised over $1,000 through sponsorships with a team of colleagues during the Heart Association's charity cycling event on April 22nd, so I think this would be a great way to continue that momentum and show our company's commitment to giving back.
